gpt_critique.critique: Model B's reasoning aligns better on Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure; Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions; Partnerships for the Goals. I updated those three scores accordingly.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Course mentions diverse business units and cultivating innovation; supports stronger industry/infrastructure relevance.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: B highlights compliance and ethics/sustainability for strong institutions; aligns course emphasis more explicitly.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Course shows co-creation and industry-academia collaboration; higher score reflects stronger partnerships.
